attributes.action: Legalise cannabis for recreational and medicinal use
attributes.additional_details: cannabis is less harmful than legal drugs such as legal highs, cigarettes and alcohol. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RGyfbNE8Tak
attributes.background: cannabis is an amazing plant with loads of medicinal values, why keep it illegal if studies have proven for marijuana to have multiple medicinal values, its less harmful than legal drugs such as cigarettes. countries all around the world are legalising it, i think its time for the UK to do the same.
